title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: August 25, 2022, 09:44:51 PMLast edit: August 25, 2022, 10:49:06 PM by ZipReg
content: Greetings Everyone! I hope you're all doing well!  CoolStorage.org Presents..."THE TIMES TRAVELER"16x20 Gallery Wrapped LOADED Canvas#001 CANVAS CRYPTO PUZZLE CONTEST!A hoard of loaded canvases with a design based on a sci-fi concept that altersthe iconic January 3rd, 2009 THE TIMES front page layout. Disguised as aconceptual art project, The Limited Edition pieces of The Times Traveler containan intricate crypto puzzle which has been carefully embedded into their design.Whomever is skilled enough to find the secrets and successfully unlocks the key,claims all of the BTC locked away in the canvases! General Info: THE SETUP!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403917.0THE REVEAL!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404156.0Official Contest Thread:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5407075.0Detailed Limited Edition Release Information:https://coolstorage.org/TheTimesTravelerCONTEST ENTRY FEE:Price Per Entry: 0.008BTCShipping: *INCLUDED!* Any Import/VAT taxes paid by entrant.*Up to $50.00 / entrant pays any additional shipping espensesPayment: Will PM details to entrants.There is also a welcome raffle,   FREE for contestants   to join   for achance to win a prototype canvas of the next crypto puzzle contest release.Casascius KEEP CALM and HODLhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410154.0Almost Full!  Join a first of it's kind contest, own a one of a kind collectible canvas,and compete for the BTCTC Grand Prize embedded in them! Contest entries are available on a first come first serve basis.Few entry slots remaining! Thank you for your interest!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Sign me up!! This looks fun sir

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on September 12, 2022, 10:52:46 AMSign me up!! This looks fun sir LOL I forgot I posted this here! SkAM!  The contest officially launched and has been running for almost THREE WEEKS now. Check out the official contest thread.The BTCTC Grand Prize is still up for grabs, so if you have skillz, ENTER and claim that Grand Prize! Thanks guys
